landing.title: Welcome to Our Boilerplate App
landing.text: This is a brief description of our boilerplate app. It's designed to help you kickstart your next project.

signin.title: Login
signin.description: Enter your email and password to login to your account

forgotpassword.title: Reset Password
forgotpassword.description: If you forgot your password, we will send you a mail to create a new one.
